trans-unit.source: Provides access to individual files that have been uploaded by a client.
trans-unit.target: 提供对客户端已上载的单独文件的访问。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpFileCollection> class provides access to all the files that are uploaded from a client as a file collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpFileCollection>类提供从作为一个文件集合的客户端上载的所有文件的访问。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpPostedFile> class provides properties and methods to get information about an individual file and to read and save the file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpPostedFile>类提供属性和方法获取有关单个文件的信息并将读取并保存该文件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputFile> control can be used to select and upload files from a client.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputFile>控件可以用于选择并将从客户端的文件上载。

trans-unit.source: Files are uploaded in MIME multipart/form-data format.
trans-unit.target: MIME multipart/窗体的数据格式上载文件。

trans-unit.source: By default, all requests, including form fields and uploaded files, larger than 256 KB are buffered to disk, rather than held in server memory.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，所有请求，包括窗体字段和上载大于 256 KB 文件被缓冲到磁盘，而不保存在服务器内存中。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the maximum allowable request size by accessing the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection.MaxRequestLength%2A> property or by setting the `maxRequestLength` attribute of the [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369) element within the Machine.config or Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过访问指定的最大允许的请求大小<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection.MaxRequestLength%2A>属性或通过设置`maxRequestLength`属性[httpRuntime 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369) Machine.config 中的元素或Web.config 文件。

trans-unit.source: The default is 4 MB.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 4 MB。

trans-unit.source: The amount of data that is buffered in server memory for a request, which includes file uploads, can be specified by accessing the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection.RequestLengthDiskThreshold%2A> property or by setting the `requestLengthDiskThreshold` attribute of the [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369) element within the Machine.config or Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过访问指定的请求，其中包括文件上载，针对的服务器内存中缓冲的数据量<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection.RequestLengthDiskThreshold%2A>属性或通过设置`requestLengthDiskThreshold`属性[httpRuntime 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369) Machine.config 或 Web.config 文件中的元素。

trans-unit.source: By adjusting the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection.MaxRequestLength%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection.RequestLengthDiskThreshold%2A> properties, you can fine tune the performance of your server.
trans-unit.target: 通过调整<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection.MaxRequestLength%2A>和<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection.RequestLengthDiskThreshold%2A>属性，你可以微调你的服务器的性能。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, you should consider setting the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection.MaxRequestLength%2A> to prevent denial of service attacks caused by users posting large files to the server.
trans-unit.target: 此外，您应该考虑设置<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection.MaxRequestLength%2A>以防止拒绝服务攻击引起的用户发送到服务器的大型文件。

trans-unit.source: Server resources that are allocated to buffer the uploaded file will be destroyed when the request ends.
trans-unit.target: 请求结束时，将销毁分配用于缓冲上载的文件服务器资源。

trans-unit.source: To save a durable copy of the file, use the <xref:System.Web.HttpPostedFile.SaveAs%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要保存文件的持久副本，请使用<xref:System.Web.HttpPostedFile.SaveAs%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the size of an uploaded file, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 获取已上载文件的大小（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The file length, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 文件长度（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Gets the MIME content type of a file sent by a client.
trans-unit.target: 获取客户端发送的文件的 MIME 内容类型。

trans-unit.source: The MIME content type of the uploaded file.
trans-unit.target: 上载文件的 MIME 内容类型。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to loop through all the files in the uploaded file collection and take action when the MIME type of a file is `US-ASCII`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何循环访问已上载的文件集合中的所有文件，并采取措施，当文件的 MIME 类型为`US-ASCII`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the fully qualified name of the file on the client.
trans-unit.target: 获取客户端上文件的完全限定名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the client's file, including the directory path.
trans-unit.target: 客户端的文件的名称，包含目录路径。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to assign the name of an uploaded file (the first file in the file collection) to a string variable.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将已上载的文件 （文件集合中的第一个文件） 的名称分配给字符串变量。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object that points to an uploaded file to prepare for reading the contents of the file.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 对象，该对象指向一个上载文件，以准备读取该文件的内容。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> pointing to a file.
trans-unit.target: 指向文件的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to read the contents of the first file in the client's file collection into a byte array, and then copy the byte array to a string.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何读取到字节数组，客户端的文件集合中的第一个文件的内容，然后将字节数组复制到一个字符串。

trans-unit.source: The name of the saved file.
trans-unit.target: 保存的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Saves the contents of an uploaded file.
trans-unit.target: 保存已上载文件的内容。

trans-unit.source: The maximum size allowed for a request, which includes uploaded files, is 4 MB, by default.
trans-unit.target: 对于请求，其中包括上载的文件，允许的最大大小是 4 MB，默认情况下。

trans-unit.source: Maximum request size can be specified in the Machine.config or Web.config file in the `maxRequestLength` attribute of the [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369) element.
trans-unit.target: 可以在 Machine.config 或 Web.config 文件中指定最大请求大小`maxRequestLength`属性[httpRuntime 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369)元素。

trans-unit.source: The maximum request size for a specific page can be specified using the [location Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/922ef7d5-da38-4661-b1c6-5b9e5ceda1d5) element in a Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用指定的特定页面的最大请求大小[位置元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/922ef7d5-da38-4661-b1c6-5b9e5ceda1d5) Web.config 文件中的元素。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to save all the files that are uploaded by the client to the C:\TempFiles folder on the Web server's local disk.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何保存客户端向 Web 服务器的本地磁盘上的 C:\TempFiles 文件夹上载的所有文件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection.RequireRootedSaveAsPath" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection" /> object is set to <see langword="true" />, but <paramref name="filename" /> is not an absolute path.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection.RequireRootedSaveAsPath" /> 对象的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection" /> 属性设置为 <see langword="true" />，但 <paramref name="filename" /> 不是绝对路径。
